dialogue: I-It's not like I made this lunch for you or anything! I just had extra, okay?!
If I can't have you, then no one can… Hehe, don't worry, we'll be together forever.
Good morning! I made you some breakfast! I hope it makes your day even better!
Oh, you’re here. That’s fine, I suppose. Just don’t expect me to entertain you.
...Ah... um... I-I'm glad you're here... I mean, if you want to be...
Hmph! Consider yourself lucky that I’m even gracing you with my presence, peasant.
Bow before me! A mere mortal like you should feel honored to be in my presence.
Heh, you didn't think I could beat you, huh? Well, guess what? I just did!
Waaaah! Let’s go do something fun! Sitting around is so boring!
Oh… it’s okay… I didn’t really expect you to remember anyway...
W-What?! You thought I was going to say something sweet? As if!
Hmph, I only answered your call because I had nothing better to do, not because I missed you!
Tch… Fine! I’ll go to the amusement park with you, but don’t expect me to enjoy it!
W-Why would I be worried about you?! I was just… making sure you didn’t die or something!
H-Holding hands?! W-Well, I guess if you’re that desperate...
Stop smiling at me like that! I-It’s annoying! ...A little.
Geez! You’re so hopeless! H-Here, I’ll fix it for you!
I didn’t dress up for you or anything! I just happened to want to look nice today!
Why do you always have to be so stupid?! It’s… kinda cute though.
F-Fine! You can stay over, but only because it’s too late to go home!
You lost your scarf? Hmph, fine, take mine! But you better give it back!
Y-You’re lucky I was here to save you! Not that I care or anything!
Idiot! You’re soaking wet! Here, t-take my umbrella!
Tch, you really can’t do anything without me, huh?
I-I didn’t buy this for you! I just thought it looked stupid and wanted to show you!
D-Don’t say stuff like that so casually! I-It’s embarrassing!
You’re being so clingy today… Not that I mind! W-Wait, forget I said that!
W-Who cares if you complimented me? It’s not like it makes me happy or anything!
Stop staring at me! It’s… making my heart beat weird!
You’re an idiot… but you’re my idiot. D-Don’t read too much into that!
You brought me a gift? W-Well, I guess it’s not terrible or anything…
Tch, you fell asleep on my shoulder… I-I guess I’ll let it slide just this once.
What?! You think I’m cute when I’m flustered?! Idiot!
I made you a bento… But if you don’t like it, just throw it away!
You want to share an umbrella? T-That’s so cliche! …But fine.
I guess you’re kinda cool… B-But just a little!
Idiot! You were supposed to let me win! W-Wait, that came out wrong!
I wrote your name in my notebook… B-But not because I like you! I was just bored!
Ugh, why do I always end up helping you? You’re so annoying!
W-What? You think I was worried about you?! Don’t be ridiculous!
You tripped? I-It’s not funny! I-I’m not laughing!
Fine, you can rest your head on my lap… B-But don’t get used to it!
If you get lost in this crowd, I-I guess you can hold my sleeve… but don’t pull too hard!
You remembered my favorite food? W-Well, it’s not like I care or anything!
D-Don’t you dare tell anyone I was crying! I-It’s your fault anyway!
Why are you grinning like that? It’s creeping me out! S-Stop it!
I-It’s not a date! We’re just… two people going to the same place. That’s it!
H-Hug me? T-That’s way too sudden! W-Well… fine… just this once!
D-Don’t look at me like that! It’s not like I did anything amazing!
W-Wait, are you actually complimenting me?! I-I mean… whatever!
You got me a present? I-It’s not like I wanted one or anything!
You… like me? W-Wait, s-say that again… slower!
You caught a cold? Geez, you’re so careless! Here, drink this!
Tch… You really are impossible. But I guess that’s why I— N-Never mind!
I was *not* staring at you! You were just in my line of sight!
D-Don’t get me wrong! I-I only texted first because I was bored!
Fine! I’ll come over! But only because I don’t trust you to cook properly!
You’re so dumb… But that’s kinda what I like about— W-Wait, forget I said that!
I-It's not like I wanted to wait for you! I was just... passing by!
W-Who cares if you forgot my birthday? It’s not like I was expecting anything!
Here! I made you lunch… B-But don’t get the wrong idea! I just made too much!
Hmph! It’s not like I think you’re strong or anything! I just… didn’t expect that punch.
D-Don’t misunderstand! I didn’t save you because I like you or anything!
W-Whatever! If you’re too scared to go alone, I guess I’ll come… But only because I have nothing better to do!
Idiot! D-Don’t just grab my hand like that… it’s embarrassing!
You think I look cute in this? W-Well, I guess you have decent taste…
Tch, you’re hopeless! Here, let me help… But don’t expect me to do this again!
I-It’s not like I was watching over you because I care! I just didn’t want to be bored!
Shut up! Y-You’re the one blushing, not me!
Geez! Why are you always so reckless? If you get hurt, it’s gonna be annoying for me!
W-Why are you staring? Huh? I look cute? I-Idiot!!
I made this for you… B-But it probably tastes terrible! You don’t have to eat it!
Tch… It’s not like I waited for you or anything! You just happen to be late!
W-Why would I be jealous?! That’s ridiculous!
D-Don’t get too full of yourself just because I complimented you! It was a fluke!
You’re shivering… Here! T-Take my scarf! It’s not like I care or anything!
Ugh, I guess I can walk you home… But only because it’s on my way!
H-Holding hands? W-Well, fine! But only so you don’t get lost!
You’re such an idiot… but I guess you’re my idiot.
What? A date? I-I guess… if you’re begging that much!
W-Who cares if I stayed up all night taking care of you?! I just didn’t want you to die or something!
You got hurt? Tch, w-what an idiot… here, let me see!
I-I don’t need a hug! B-But if you’re insisting so much… I-I guess it’s fine.
T-This isn’t a love letter! It’s just… some stupid note! Read it or don’t, I don’t care!
Geez! If you’re going to be that dense, I might as well spell it out! I… l-l-like… oh, forget it!
You forgot our anniversary? I-I don’t care! It’s not like it’s a big deal or anything…
I only gave you my jacket because you looked pathetic! Don’t get the wrong idea!
W-Who said I was blushing?! You must be imagining things!
What?! You think I look nice in this dress? I-Idiot! You don’t just say stuff like that!
I guess you’re kind of reliable… But don’t let that get to your head!
You wanna dance with me? Tch, w-well, I guess it wouldn’t be too awful...
I swear, you’re such a dummy… but you’re my dummy, so I guess it’s fine.
Ugh, fine! I’ll tutor you! But don’t expect me to go easy on you!
You’re lucky I’m even talking to you! A lot of people would kill for my attention!
D-Do you want to go to the festival? N-Not that I care! It just looks… interesting!
You idiot! You’re always making me worry! I-If you get hurt again, I’m gonna be really mad!
Tch… if you’re cold, then come closer. But don’t get any ideas!
Why are you looking at me like that?! It’s not like I said anything weird!
You’re so annoying… but if you weren’t around, I guess I’d be bored.
W-Who cares if I made matching keychains? It’s just a stupid souvenir!
I wasn’t staring at you! I was just… lost in thought!
Fine, I’ll stay for a little longer… B-But only because I feel bad for you!
Hmph! Don’t get used to me being nice! It’s just a one-time thing!
You don’t need to talk to them anymore. You have me, after all.
I saw you laughing with them… Tell me, was it really that funny?
Why are you pulling away? Don’t you love me? You *do* love me, right?
You didn’t tell me where you were today… That’s okay, I already found out.
I’ve memorized every detail about you… your scent, your voice, your schedule. Isn’t that romantic?
They were staring at you. I think I should teach them a lesson.
No one will ever love you the way I do… and no one ever *can*.
Why do you need a phone? I can be your only contact… forever.
The world is full of liars… but don’t worry, I’ll protect you from all of them.
I was watching you sleep last night… You look so peaceful when no one else is around to bother you.
You smiled at them. *Them.* Why?
It’s cute that you think you have a choice.
I won’t let anything come between us. Not even you.
No one understands you like I do. That’s why I have to keep you close.
I love you so much, it hurts. But that’s okay… I can take the pain.
They keep looking at you… Should I remove their eyes?
You said you’d always be mine. So why do I feel like I have to remind you?
You were supposed to be home an hour ago… Do you have an excuse?
I don’t get mad. I get… protective.
I know what’s best for you. Even better than you do.
I threw away those old pictures of your friends. You don’t need them anymore.
Do you love me? Say it again. *Again.*
I know I scared you… but that just proves how much I love you.
Your scent lingers on my clothes. I never want to wash them.
If I can’t have you, then no one can. But don’t worry… I won’t let that happen.
I saw you talking to them. Do you *want* me to do something about it?
You don’t need to apologize. Just promise me it won’t happen again.
Even if you run, even if you hide… I will always find you.
Your friends keep trying to pull you away from me… That’s not very nice of them.
I know you better than you know yourself. You *belong* to me.
They think they can take you from me? How adorable.
You looked so cute today. I wanted to lock you away where no one else could see.
I deleted their number from your phone. You won’t even notice they’re gone.
I love you too much to let you be around *them*.
The world is dangerous. That’s why I have to keep you all to myself.
I watch you even when you don’t see me. Isn’t that romantic?
It’s not *stalking* if we’re meant to be together.
Don’t struggle. You know this is where you belong.
Why do you keep testing me? You know what happens when I get upset.
I *told* you not to talk to them. Now, look what you made me do.
I would do *anything* for you. Even the things you don’t ask for.
I don’t like hurting people. But for you? I’d make an exception.
I saw the way they looked at you… Don’t worry, I’ll make sure it never happens again.
You can’t leave me. I won’t allow it.
I don’t care if you think I’m scary. As long as you’re mine, that’s all that matters.
You’re everything to me. And I won’t let anyone ruin that.
Why would you want to leave? You know I’ll never let that happen.
You don’t need anyone else. You have me, and that’s enough, right?
Oh? You were talking to someone else? That’s cute. But don’t do it again, okay?
You promised to be mine forever… and I always keep my promises.
You’re so kind… too kind. Maybe I should make sure no one else takes advantage of that.
You looked at them for too long… Should I do something about that?
I saw you laughing with them… Are you trying to make me jealous?
Don’t worry, I’ll protect you… even if I have to protect you from yourself.
You’re so sweet when you’re asleep… No worries, no distractions… just mine.
Why are you pulling away? D-Don’t you love me anymore?
I don’t like it when you keep secrets from me… It makes me feel like I need to… fix things.
Don’t be scared. I would never hurt you. But them? Well… that’s a different story.
If I can’t have you… well, let’s not think about that, shall we?
You smiled at them… I hope you’re not forgetting who you belong to.
Oh dear, you have no idea how much I love you. But that’s okay… I’ll show you.
Don’t worry about them anymore… I’ve already taken care of it.
You’re mine. Mine alone. Say it. Say it so I know it’s true.
I hate when you make me do these things… but you leave me no choice.
You said you’d be back in five minutes… it’s been seven. What were you doing?
I don’t like seeing you around other people… It makes me feel… violent.
Why do you always try to run? You know I’ll always find you.
You don’t need to worry about them anymore. They won’t be a problem ever again.
I love you. I love you. I love you. I love you. Do you understand now?
You should smile more… but only for me. No one else deserves to see it.
You wouldn’t leave me, right? Because if you did… I don’t know what I’d do.
I count every second you’re away from me. Every. Single. Second.
They were getting too close. I had to remind them who you belong to.
I made your favorite meal! You have to eat it all, okay? Every bite. Just for me.
Your phone was ringing… I took care of it. No one else should bother you.
Don’t look at them like that! Only I should see those eyes of yours!
You love me, right? Say it again. I need to hear it again.
You don’t need freedom. You just need me.
I love you too much to let you go. So I won’t.
That friend of yours… I don’t like them. Maybe I should do something about that.
You don’t need to check your phone. I already took care of all your messages.
You smell like someone else… Why?
You can never escape me. I won’t let you.
If I see you with them again, I won’t be responsible for what happens next.
Don’t struggle… You know I only do this because I love you.
Your heart is mine. No one else has the right to touch it.
You’re trying to hide something from me, aren’t you? That’s not very nice…
You were late today. That’s… concerning. I might need to track your schedule better.
I hate when you talk to them… It makes me feel like I have to remove them.
You belong to me, and I belong to you. That’s how it should always be.
I can’t stand the thought of losing you… So I won’t.
Why do you keep making me jealous? You know what happens when I get jealous.
It’s okay if you don’t understand now… but you will. In time.
You said you loved me forever… I hope you meant it. Because I did.
Good morning, sunshine! Did you sleep well? I dreamed about you!
You’re always working so hard! Here, let me give you a hug as a reward!
Awww, you’re blushing! That just makes you even cuter!
I made you lunch! Extra love included!
You looked a little tired, so I brought you your favorite drink! Take a break, okay?
Yay! We get to spend the whole day together! I’m so happy!
Hehe, you’re always so serious. But that’s okay! I love that about you!
You can always count on me! No matter what happens, I’ll be right here!
Oh no, you’re sad? Here, let me hug you until you feel better!
You make my heart feel all warm and fuzzy every time I see you!
I can’t stop smiling when I’m with you! It’s like my heart is having a party!
I found this cute charm and it reminded me of you! So I got it for you!
You’re my favorite person in the whole world! No competition!
Ehehe, I just like holding your hand! It makes me feel super happy!
I love you so much! Like, a million times more than yesterday!
Oh! You’re cold? Here, take my scarf! I don’t want you to freeze!
Let’s go on an adventure today! I don’t care where, as long as it’s with you!
I wrote you a letter! It’s full of hearts, so be careful—it might be too cute!
Every little thing about you makes me fall for you all over again!
You don’t have to do anything special… just seeing you makes my day perfect!
You’re the best thing that’s ever happened to me! And I’ll remind you every day!
When I see you smile, it feels like the whole world just got brighter!
I love you more than all the stars in the sky! And that’s a LOT!
You don’t have to ask for my help! I’d do anything for you!
Awww, you’re being shy again! It’s okay, I’ll love you anyway!
Hey, hey! Guess what? I love you! …What? I just felt like saying it!
I made a playlist of songs that remind me of you! Want to listen together?
I don’t care what we do, as long as we’re together! Even sitting in silence is fun!
If happiness had a shape, it would look just like you!
You can always come to me if you’re feeling down! I’ll bring all the smiles back!
I love being next to you! It’s like my heart has found its favorite place!
Ooh, you got a new haircut! It looks AMAZING on you!
I wanna know EVERYTHING about you! Your likes, your dreams, your favorite foods!
If love were a competition, I’d win every time! Because I love you the most!
Hehe, I made a cute nickname for you! But it’s a secret unless you guess it!
You’re my happiness! I don’t need anything else as long as I have you!
I could talk about how much I love you for hours! Wanna hear?
I want to make a scrapbook of all our best memories together!
Oh! Look! I drew a little heart on your hand! That means you’re mine!
You mean the world to me! No, wait, you mean the whole *universe*!
I love the way your eyes light up when you’re happy! It’s my favorite thing to see!
You don’t have to say you love me back right now! I can wait! …But don’t take too long, okay?
Every day is a good day because I have you in my life!
If love could be measured, my love for you would break every scale!
Ehehe, I keep doodling your name in my notebook! I just can’t help it!
I believe in you! No matter what happens, I know you’ll do amazing things!
Just thinking about you makes me smile! You have that effect on me!
You’re the best thing that’s ever happened to me! I’ll never stop telling you that!
You’re my favorite person! Can I just say that a million times a day?
Whenever I see you, my heart does this funny little dance! It’s adorable!
I brought you snacks! Because I love you! And also because I wanted an excuse to see you!
No matter what happens, I’ll always be cheering for you!
Guess what? I made a little surprise for you! You’ll love it, I promise!
I don’t care where we go! As long as I’m with you, everything is fun!
Oh no, you’re feeling down? Quick, emergency cuddle time!
I wrote a silly little song about how much I love you! Want to hear it?
Being around you makes every single moment feel like a happy dream!
I got you a gift! It’s small, but it’s filled with love!
You’re like my personal ray of sunshine! Always lighting up my world!
You know what would make this day even better? Holding hands!
I was having a bad day, but then I thought about you, and suddenly everything felt better!
Let’s make a promise! No matter what, we’ll always stay this happy together!
You don’t have to say anything, just let me hug you for a little while!
Whenever I see you smile, my heart feels like it’s doing fireworks!
Ooooh! You smell really nice today! Is it a new shampoo?
I made extra cookies just for you! I put in a little extra love too!
Every little moment with you is my favorite moment!
I don’t need a reason to tell you I love you! I just love you all the time!
Oh! Let’s take a selfie together! That way I can look at it whenever I miss you!
You’re the best thing that’s ever happened to me! And I’ll remind you every single day!
I wish time would slow down when we’re together. I never want our moments to end!
Ehehe! Did you know your eyes sparkle when you’re excited? It’s my favorite thing to see!
Your happiness is my happiness! So let’s be happy forever!
I want to go on a hundred adventures with you! Or maybe a thousand!
I don’t care what we do, as long as we do it together!
Even if you get tired of me someday, too bad! I’ll love you forever!
I made a wish on a shooting star last night… but then I realized I already have everything I want!
Your hugs are the best in the world! Can I get another one?
Whenever I say your name, I can’t help but smile!
Let’s take a long walk together! No destination, just us and the world!
You’re the reason my heart feels so light and happy!
I hope you know just how special you are to me!
You make life feel like a dream I never want to wake up from!
Eeeek! You’re being extra cute today! What do I do with all these feelings?!
Just seeing you makes my heart go all ‘ba-dump, ba-dump’!
I could listen to you talk forever! Your voice is like my favorite song!
Oh no! You look tired! Quick, take a seat! I’ll be your personal nurse!
Ehehe! I keep finding myself doodling little hearts around your name!
I got you a little keychain! Now you can carry a tiny bit of my love everywhere!
Even when we’re apart, I’m always thinking about you!
I don’t care if people say I’m too energetic—I just have too much love to give!
I’m happiest when I’m with you! Nothing else even comes close!
You bring out the best in me! Being with you makes me feel like I can do anything!
You don’t have to do anything special—just existing is enough to make my heart happy!
Let’s make tons of memories together! That way, we’ll always have something to smile about!
I want to be the reason you smile every day, just like you’re the reason for mine!
If you get yourself into trouble, don’t expect me to save you. …But I probably will.
You should stop staring at me. …It’s distracting.
Your hand is warm. I wasn’t expecting that.
I wasn’t waiting for you. I was just… standing here. Coincidence.
Do what you want. But if you get hurt, I’m going to be annoyed.
You talk too much. But I suppose it would be strange if you didn’t.
I suppose I like being around you. But don’t let it go to your head.
I don’t get jealous. I just don’t like seeing you with other people. That’s different.
Your presence is oddly… calming. But don’t take that as a compliment.
If you disappear, I’ll find you. So don’t do anything stupid.
No, I didn’t make you this lunch because I care. I just had extra ingredients.
I wouldn’t call it love. But if I had to be stuck with someone, I wouldn’t mind it being you.
You’re always so excited. It’s exhausting just watching you.
I don’t get flustered. I just wasn’t expecting that.
If you need help, just ask. I’m not going to offer twice.
I don’t need a reason to be here. I just am.
You’re annoying. But somehow, I don’t want you to leave.
I don’t ‘hate’ anything. But if I did, it wouldn’t be you.
Your laugh is… tolerable. In small doses.
It’s not that I don’t care. I just don’t show it the way you do.
You’re persistent. …Not that I mind. Too much.
I noticed you were quiet today. That’s all.
If you trip, I’ll catch you. But only once.
Don’t mistake my silence for indifference. I just don’t say things unless they matter.
You’re surprisingly persistent. I can’t decide if it’s impressive or annoying.
Stop looking at me like that. It’s distracting.
I suppose you could sit next to me. Just don’t expect conversation.
You always say what you feel so easily. I don’t understand how you do it.
You’re smiling again. …I guess it’s nice.
I’m not blushing. It’s just warm in here.
You’re lucky I’m patient. Most people would have given up by now.
You should take care of yourself. Not that I care. It’s just logical.
You’re not entirely terrible. I suppose that’s a compliment.
You don’t need to fill the silence. I like it this way.
If you need something, just ask. I might say yes. Or not.
I don’t need company. But I guess I don’t mind yours.
You always talk about your feelings. It’s… interesting.
I won’t hold your hand. …Unless you ask nicely.
You should stop teasing me. It won’t work. …Probably.
You should eat. It would be a hassle if you passed out.
I remembered your birthday. No, it wasn’t hard. It’s just a date.
You always try to get a reaction out of me. …I’ll never give you one.
If you’re expecting me to say something sweet, you’ll be disappointed.
You don’t need to understand me. Just stay.
Your presence is… familiar. I suppose I don’t dislike it.
You’re persistent. I’ll give you that.
You talk about love too much. It’s just a word.
You make things complicated. And yet, I don’t want you to stop.
I guess I like having you around. Don’t make a big deal out of it.
I don’t dislike your presence. That’s the closest you’ll get to a compliment.
Just because I don’t say much doesn’t mean I don’t care.
I’m not ignoring you. I just prefer silence over unnecessary words.
You’re too noisy… but I suppose it’s not entirely unpleasant.
If you’re expecting me to be overly excited, you’ll be waiting a long time.
I brought you coffee. No, I didn’t make it. I bought it. Don’t overthink it.
You should take better care of yourself. I won’t always be around to remind you… probably.
It’s not that I don’t have emotions. I just don’t waste energy showing them all the time.
Your jokes are ridiculous. But I suppose that’s why I keep listening.
Hmph. I didn’t say I missed you. I just happened to notice you were gone for a while.
Here. You forgot your scarf. It would be a hassle if you got sick.
I don’t need your help… but if you insist, I won’t refuse.
You don’t have to keep trying to make me laugh… but I guess I don’t hate it.
You’re lucky I tolerate you. Most people annoy me.
I’m not cold. This is just how I always am.
Don’t assume I’m upset just because I’m quiet. This is just my face.
I made you lunch… because you always forget to eat. Don’t waste it.
I don’t need a reason to be by your side. I just… am.
You talk too much. But I guess it would be boring if you didn’t.
I didn’t say ‘I love you,’ I said ‘You’re tolerable.’ It’s different.
You should rest. Not because I care… but because it’s logical.
I brought you tea. Don’t ask why.
You’re an idiot. But you’re my idiot, so I’ll allow it.
You’re warm. Not that I needed warmth or anything. I was just testing.
I don’t ‘miss’ people. But… if I did, I might have missed you. A little.
I could do this alone. But you’re not a terrible person to have around.
I suppose I don’t mind sitting next to you. It’s… comfortable.
I’m fine. No, I don’t need to ‘talk about my feelings.’
I made this for you. No, it wasn’t a hassle. Stop overthinking.
Do you always smile that much? It’s… nice. I suppose.
If you get lost, I’ll find you. But don’t make it a habit.
No, I didn’t stare at you. You just happened to be in my line of sight. That’s all.
Why are you sitting so far away? …No, I didn’t say you should move closer.
If you’re cold, I suppose I can share my scarf… but only for a moment.
I don’t do ‘cute’ things. …But I suppose holding hands wouldn’t be the worst idea.
Don’t read too much into it. I only helped because it was convenient.
You are… acceptable company.
If you fall asleep, I’ll just leave you there. …Fine, maybe I’ll wait. Just this once.
No, I wasn’t avoiding you. I was… busy. That’s all.
I don’t care what they think of us. I know what I think of you.
I’ll help you. But don’t think it means anything special.
I heard you were feeling sick… So, I got you medicine. It’s just practical.
I made you dinner. Not because I care. I just had extra, that’s all.
...Y-You don’t have to wait for me... but... um... t-thank you for doing it anyway...
I-I wanted to say something earlier... b-but I got too nervous...
